name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Build Engineer with a strong emphasis on compliance and risk management, leveraging 13+ years of technical expertise. Proven ability in project delivery with a focus on continuous improvement and resource planning. Proficient in conducting site audits and ensuring adherence to health & safety regulations. Excellent problem-solving skills and a collaborative approach to network activation and civil works, supported by comprehensive documentation and invoicing capabilities.
Technically adept with a diverse skill set including **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, alongside frontend frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, and **Vue**. Experienced in backend development with **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**, and knowledgeable in deploying cloud-native systems on **AWS** and **Azure**. Strong background in compliance-driven development aligned with standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2.
